mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_qna_base.select */ SELECT qna_no /* qna_no 질의응답_번호 numeric */ ,qust_guar_no /* qust_guar_no 질문_보호자_번호 numeric */ ,qust_dt /* qust_dt 질문_일자 character(8) */ ,qust_tm /* qust_tm 질문_시각 character(6) */ ,qust_titl /* qust_titl 질문_제목 character varying(200) */ ,qust_cntn /* qust_cntn 질문_내용 text */ ,answer_user_id /* answer_user_id 답변_사용자_ID character varying(40) */ ,answer_dt /* answer_dt 답변_일자 character(8) */ ,answer_tm /* answer_tm 답변_시각 character(6) */ ,answer_cntn /* answer_cntn 답변_내용 text */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ts_qna_base WHERE 1 = 1 AND qna_no = #{qnaNo} /* qna_no 질의응답_번호 numeric */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_qna_base.insert */ INSERT INTO ts_qna_base ( qna_no /* qna_no 질의응답_번호 numeric */
,qust_guar_no /* qust_guar_no 질문_보호자_번호 numeric */
,qust_dt /* qust_dt 질문_일자 character(8) */
,qust_tm /* qust_tm 질문_시각 character(6) */
,qust_titl /* qust_titl 질문_제목 character varying(200) */
,qust_cntn /* qust_cntn 질문_내용 text */
,answer_user_id /* answer_user_id 답변_사용자_ID character varying(40) */
,answer_dt /* answer_dt 답변_일자 character(8) */
,answer_tm /* answer_tm 답변_시각 character(6) */
,answer_cntn /* answer_cntn 답변_내용 text */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) VALUES ( #{qnaNo} /* qna_no 질의응답_번호 numeric */
,#{qustGuarNo} /* qust_guar_no 질문_보호자_번호 numeric */
,#{qustDt} /* qust_dt 질문_일자 character(8) */
,#{qustTm} /* qust_tm 질문_시각 character(6) */
,#{qustTitl} /* qust_titl 질문_제목 character varying(200) */
,#{qustCntn} /* qust_cntn 질문_내용 text */
,#{answerUserId} /* answer_user_id 답변_사용자_ID character varying(40) */
,#{answerDt} /* answer_dt 답변_일자 character(8) */
,#{answerTm} /* answer_tm 답변_시각 character(6) */
,#{answerCntn} /* answer_cntn 답변_내용 text */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ )

,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND qna_no = #{qnaNo} /* qna_no 질의응답_번호 numeric */
